Class Store

java.lang.Object
  Store

public class Store
extends Object

Class Store will maintain Customer, Item and Gift and handle all sale and redeem functions.

Author:
Xu Waycell, Way Studios
See Also:
Model, ModelStackArray, Item, Gift, Customer
